name: Almost Human (magnazur)
description:
Hello thank you for visiting my project. It is unfinished project and early prototype which I made for my college task. Please feel free to test it and leave feedback.  It is adventure prototype without combat system.

If you can please do this survey after playing the test game. It will be of much help for me for my college task:  https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc2DQyiM8eDShuFXvMMg2uaYUnEsh4OMDKAmv1l... .

I made environment assets for this game so if you are interested to use them also you can find it on my creator page. 

I hope you will have some fun!
